prodNameC: "恩奈格斯特"  帶狀泡疹病毒 IgM抗體 檢驗試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
Enzygnost* Anti-VZV/igM Test Plate: microtitration plate coated with inactivated VZV-antigens The left row of a strip contains antigen from VZV infected human fibroblasts and the right row contains antigen from uninfected cells (=control antigen). 
Anti-Human-IgM/POD Conjugate: Goat antibodies to human IgM conjugated with peroxidase in 0.05 mo/L Tris/HCl Buffer solution, pH 7.2, with polygeline 0.5%.
Conjugate Buffer Microbiol: 37 mg EDTA in one liter of 0.01 mol/L phosphate buffer solution, pH 7.2, with Tetronic, approximately 2%, BSA approximately 1%. 
Anti-VZV Reference P/P: Human serum with IgG-antibodies to VZV-antigens in conjunction with rheumatoid factors (RF) in Tris buffer solution (20 mmol/L), pH 7.4, with HUmanalbin (5%), approximately 60%. 
Anti-VZV Reference P/N: Human serum with IgG-antibodies to VZV-antigens in Tris buffer solution (20 mmol/L), pH 7.4, with Humanalbin (5%), approximately 60%. 
Sample Buffer POD 0.3 mol/L Tris/HCl buffer solution, pH 8.0-8.2, with Tween 20 approximately 0.
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 定性檢測和定量測定人類血清和血漿中帶狀泡疹病毒特異性IgM抗體的酵素免疫分析法。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學用裝置
